name: Avert Your Eyes
summary: Link #12 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. is footage from a hiking trip in west Germany. The video quality is abhorrent for what should be a modern phone and the device itself is caked in ashes.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Haunted PS1 Presents CHAIN - Game 12 -AVERT YOUR EYES by Jan Malitschek (No Commentary) Retro Horror
